name: SuperNeonFire
description:
How to play

you can move with W, A, S, D and shoot with the mouse click (mantain to charge up the shot). Every shot gives you recoil force that can be used to move too. The life meter and ammunition are the same, keep that in mind to avoid unfortunate situations.

Tips

If your projectiles don't work with an enemy maybe there is another way to hurt it.

Acknowledgments

Everything was done by me, except for the music and sounds that came from the following Unity Store assets:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/universal-sound-fx-17256

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/orchestral/ultimate-game-music-collection-37351
